Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Paul H.
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with a newly released Sidekick. Glad to see Danger gone and Android in. The keyboard is out of this world and the flip motion of the screen to reveal the touch/keypad is sick. It clicks into place. I'm well pleased with the item.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: snapblog
Reviews.Content: The G4 Sidekick arrived exactly as advertised and on time. The phone is great to use and a suitable substitute for an iPhone. If your a Facebook junkie it doesn't get any better or a texting junkie this Samsung Sidekick 4g t-mobile version is exactly what your looking for. All in all this is a great phone experience for anybody and the price is right.

Reviews.Title: nice phone but not amazing
Reviews.Author: kkll2014
Reviews.Content: The phone itself was nice but it was very very glitchy and did not work with other electronics very well. Battery life was not that great either. I was not impressed with this product and won't buy from this seller again. Also, when I tried to explain to them what was wrong they would not refund me or contact me after I had emailed them... very upset.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Phone.
Reviews.Author: Sylvia Soliz
Reviews.Content: It was okay, It was a Samsung Phone but In the description it said that it just needed to be reprogrammed but when i received it the phone wouldn't turn on at all, not even when i tried resetting the phone to factory settings.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Sidekick 4g
Reviews.Author: Jarrell "Ex KØTR"
Reviews.Content: Let me start off by first stating that I'm no newcomer to android phones. My previous phones include Tmobile G1, Tmobile G2, Sony Xperia Sola, and now this sidekick. I always prefer qwerty keyboards on phones and those are few and far between. So now let's get down to business.Pros:  1. Screen- vibrant and clear colors (no complaints here)  2. Keyboard- keys are nicely spaced out and not scrunched together like on the G2. They have a nice feel to them as well  3. Android OS- Froyo runs very smooth, no lag or bad spots like on my Sola; currently running dolphin browser mini  4. Slide-hinge- unlike the G2, the sidekick has a sturdy hinge and gently slides up at an angle. The G2 had a problem with the sliding mechanism getting too loose and my G2 sliding out by holding it up  5. Speakers- Good sound, not nearly as loud as my Sola, but pretty nice sound  6. Trackball- just a trackball but secured  7. 4g- Blazing fast and I'm pleased with the speedCons:  1. Occasionally the screen freezes, but only when I'm at work sweating with it in my pocket  2. Tons of unnecessary tmobile bloatware  3. Physical buttons- kind of odd placement for the home, back, menu, and shortcut buttonsOverall this is a splendid phone and I'm pleased with my purchase. I haven't had ANY MAJOR problems with this phone and I also want to say kudos to the seller for accurate phone description.

Reviews.Title: This phone sucks.
Reviews.Author: J.
Reviews.Content: It freezes whenever it wants, the battery dies fast, it reboots whenever it feels like it and sometimes eats a huge chunk of battery after it reboots so you'll have to re-charge it again..

Reviews.Title: got rid of this phone
Reviews.Author: cathy munsey
Reviews.Content: this phone is terrible!  it kept freezing up on me and i was losing calls.  i had an accident in the pouring rain and i tried to call my insurance agent and it froze up on me.  i had to remove the back of the phone, take the battery out and replace it for the phone to work again.  i kept losing calls too.  it would drop calls in the middle of a conversation.  i got another one and it did the same thing.  the people from amazon did give me a full refund.  they were very nice about it.  i loved the qwerty board.  wish it would have worked because i really liked it.

Reviews.Title: Buy it? Not even think about it
Reviews.Author: jro
Reviews.Content: This phone is super glitchy, turns off all the time and restarts itself. Freezes, randomly clicks on things. Sometimes the touch screen doesnt respond.Other issues:Random closing of text messages while typingRandom closing of phone dialer while dialingWon't receive texts for daysRandomly drops calls.DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Kiki3
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my boyfriend and he loves it. I'm starting to think more than me...lol He is always on it and exploring it. He LOVES this phone and he said if he could, he would buy more

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this phone!!
Reviews.Author: Osvaldo Perez "operez"
Reviews.Content: This phone is super glitchy, turns off all the time and restarts itself. Freezes, randomly clicks on things. Sometimes the touch screen doesnt respond.While I was excited to have this phone ,since I had all previous sidekicks I was very disappointed in it. To many glitches and being laggy. They should have kept working on this one before it was released.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: amie
Reviews.Content: The built in key board sucks! The space button doesn't work! Other than that it works fine. Except for the phone calls

Reviews.Title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT!!!
Reviews.Author: Mercedes
Reviews.Content: Received the phone suppose to be new paid $139.99 and its so not worth it the phone was clearly refurbished false advertisement I'm returning this phone ASAP!!!

Reviews.Title: Worse than the old one
Reviews.Author: Johst H. Burk
Reviews.Content: I bought this android phone since the old one was acting erratic; losing charge, shutting down, etc. you had to pop out the battery to restart. The new Sidekick was worse the the 2-year old one. So I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Got what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: ptk.zero
Reviews.Content: Hiya, So I've been looking around for a phone for casual use, namely calling, texting, occasional pictures, alarm clock, and calendar. Needless to say, I happened upon this phone.When I first received it, I absolutely loved it, but the phone was somewhat laggy which I was able to correct using a Kies Mini update for Sidekick 4g, which you can download off the internet. All i had to do was plug it in via usb and update the software. After that, my Sidekick was operating twice as fast.Another thing to note is that the only app I have on my phone that I downloaded was zedge, for ringtones and what not. If you're looking to use this for social media, heavy browsing, or heavy gaming, chances are you might want to take your cash and spend a little extra somewhere else.There are also some issues other sidekick users had with this phone. The sidekick 4g seems to be prone to some sort of bug that makes it restart over and over again and burn up the battery doing so. I actually had that problem just a few days ago and almost had to switch back to my last phone. However, upon removing my sd card and my sim card, i decided to turn on the sidekick again. All of a sudden it was back to normal and I was able to use my sidekick 4g again without it crashing or restarting randomly. Of course I can't guarantee that it would work for anyone else that comes across this problem but the sidekick 4g is by no means a bad phone.I absolutely love the way it looks, even though some might feel the buttons are awkwardly placed (doesn't really bother me) but the keyboard is probably it's distinguishing feature since it's probably the best keyboard I've ever used on a phone. It's perfect for any frequent texter. Not to mention that the touchscreen keyboard can also use Swype.Another thing to note is that I really dig the user interface and the overall layout and style of the screen. It's slightly custom and relatively unsignificant, but I honestly have a lot of problems with the bland, relatively boring/ugly user interfaces of other phones like the normal android style and bland apple setup. Just my opinion.To sum it up, I'm happy with my purchase.Pros:Phenomenal KeyboardUnique user interfaceGood looking phoneCons:Might encounter some software problemsSlightly bulkyAwkward button placement

Reviews.Title: gGREAT
Reviews.Author: Litisa Mcmillan "realsharntay"
Reviews.Content: THANK YOU IT WAS FAST AND FURIOUSWORKING GREAT. THANK YOU FOR THE EXTRA ACCESSORIESHAVE A HAPPY NEW YEAR TO COME.

Reviews.Title: Its cool
Reviews.Author: Keenan "keenan"
Reviews.Content: The only thing I dont like about this phone is that the battery dies out too quik and wont stay on for too long. I'm looking to replace the battery with a new one the can work well and last longer.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: It was a wonderful phone but I currently use another phone because of my job but I love this phone its awesome

Reviews.Title: not so good
Reviews.Author: Holly12
Reviews.Content: I'm not happy with my phone at all. I had so many problems with it that I ended up getting rid of it.More trouble then its worth.

Reviews.Title: Somewhat Satisfied
Reviews.Author: ant jack
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived very fast, it is beautiful, sturdy, and has no visible scratches or blemishes. It arrived with all accessories including headphones and turned on fine. Almost like a new sidekick (my 2nd one) BUT... so far I've noticed only 1 minor problem. Every now and then for no apparent reason the phone will restart, this happens maybe once a day. Otherwise this phone works fine, I'm actually writing this review with it. I would've gave this 5 stars, but I don't know how prominent this problem will be as its my 3rd day of use..So from my point of view..Fast shipping, like new phone and accessoriesFor 100 bucks you pretty much get what you expect

Reviews.Title: AWESOME PHONE
Reviews.Author: Angela Lassiter
Reviews.Content: I truly love  this phone,Although most of the other reviewsconstantly describe this phone as a teenager's phone.Well, I am in my 50's (definitely no teenager lol!) Butthis phone is awesome. It is a little heavy but nothing I can"t handle.It is by far the BEST! texting phone I have ever had...and I have had plenty phones.alassiter58

Reviews.Title: Good phone, but does have its limits
Reviews.Author: Mrs. H.
Reviews.Content: I've had my Sidekick 4G for about a year now and still love it. It does have its problems- sometimes freezes, if I'm trying to do too many things at once. Does use up the battery fast, if you don't dim the screen. Screen is very sensitive - easy to hang up a call while dialing (most of those problems are caused by me, not the phone).To stop the glitches and freezes, clear the memory and close programs. Pretty simple. Also, clear web browser cache and cookies. The biggest complaints I have are the cost (Tmobile kinda screwed me when we moved and renewed our contract - got signed up for 2 years and had to pay full price for the phone, instead of a cheaper upgrade) and that it is hard to see the screen in bright light.The camera and video are great. No problem sending or receiving messages or getting calls. Love the keyboard, which is why I wanted this phone in the first place.The only other problem is now my son wants one too!

Reviews.Title: Rebuilt Samsung Telephone ?
Reviews.Author: Barbara THompson
Reviews.Content: Don't beleive thats its new to many kinks,dropped calls,screen display,feel as though it's referburishedhad someone who had one in the past says the same thing looks refurbished

Reviews.Title: A pretty good phone
Reviews.Author: OlyOly "OlyOly"
Reviews.Content: I've owned this for about 9 months now and has only one annoying problem. When I am on a page and try to scroll up/down and left/right too quickly, the screen will lock up and I have to reboot the thing. Other than this it has been a great phone.I wold not have bought this phone it it didn't have android 2.2.  I've probably loaded at least 25 programs on this this and while this seems to have slowed it a little it is still emminently usable. I also bought a 16 Gb card and downloaded thousands of songs on it.I use it for music with a set of Inland Bluetooth headphones for wireless music. The wifi phone function works good. The wifi part doesn't have the range of my laptop but this is a small problem.And the keyboard is essential for all the writing I do for my legal work and my spiritual wanderings.

Reviews.Title: Everything I needed
Reviews.Author: Seph Rodney
Reviews.Content: I had a blackberry previous to this phone, and now coming into the world of Android apps, I'm quite pleased. I'm able to go to Youtube from links within emails, able to find addresses easily through Google maps, and able to see train arrivals (for certain lines) in real time using Google maps. I have downloaded good old fashioned ring tones, great background themes and alarm sounds. I haven't downloaded any games yet, but I'm not big on games.The phone does run out of juice very quickly. I'm recharging at least once a day, and sometimes is a little slow when it does not have an internet connection, but otherwise, so far so good. I like having the touch screen and being able to use the hard keyboard--which is precisely why I bought it.-Seph

Reviews.Title: Craptastic waste...
Reviews.Author: Trevor Count
Reviews.Content: This phone is terrible!!!!  The touchscreen is often unresponsive and freezes, the phone randomly shuts off or calls numbers randomly from my contact list, and has overall been very disappointing.  And now, Samsung doesn't even support or stock this lousy phone anymore, and it hasn't even been 2 years!!!  Stay away, there are better choices out there.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Tannis Graves
Reviews.Content: My son had this same phone, but it broke.  He wanted another one just like it. He is very happy with it.  It arrived promptly and it great condition as promised.

Reviews.Title: it is a great phone
Reviews.Author: blonde796
Reviews.Content: was a little woried about ordering a phone from some one other than my carrier but it cam works excellent so very happy

Reviews.Title: Daughters Phone
Reviews.Author: Arturo Hinojosa "batman"
Reviews.Content: I love it and so does my Daughter she needed another sidekick because the one she bought from T Mobile broke so this one had a good price and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Looks Are Not Everything
Reviews.Author: T. C. Schmidt "Lea-Lea"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone a little under a year ago, and it is PAST time to find something that will not drive me totally insane. Yeah, okay, it looks swell, it feels fine, the service range is excellent, and typing a text is easy (almost fun even, when the recipient actually receives it anyway). Other than that, it has been the biggest pain in the rear....stubborn, has a mind of its very own...it goes into flight mode all by itself (several times a day, ugh!); locks up (need to turn it 'off' and back 'on'); sometimes difficult to answer/change screens; shuts off by itself; I can't send texts to some people, some of the time; and messages can take days to come through (none of our other phones do that). What good is a phone if you can't communicate when you need to?

Reviews.Title: DO NOT buy this LEMON. Check the reviews
Reviews.Author: Ismael Pinto "near L.A."
Reviews.Content: Do NOT buy this phone. My girl is on her third SK4G and they all have the same problem. Instability and lock-ups. What good is a "phone" when you can't answer a call because of lock-ups. Needs battery pulls daily. Hardware wise, the specs are good. The firmware is a total failure on Samsung's part. 9 months into the phone's life and the issues have not been addressed. Look at the reviews all over the web and you will see thousands of people pulling their hair out over the frustration this phone causes. THIS PHONE IS A LEMON. THIS PHONE NEEDS A RECALL or a class action lawsuit against samsung and tmobile for continuing to sell this defective product.

Reviews.Title: phone os perfect but the charger was terrible
Reviews.Author: Nathan A.
Reviews.Content: the phone is perfect but the charger was awful i plug it in it acts like a usb in a computer asks what i want mass storage etc i have a different charger works perfectly fine, with the charger you gave me it must be the wire cause i tryed in a computer to and it goes on off on off on off on off

Reviews.Title: sidekick 4g
Reviews.Author: Bebrezzy
Reviews.Content: Well so far i dont even know about the phone other than what i seen on youtube and google. Because when i recieved the phone they sent it without a battery so i have to wait longer now but ill update soon.

Reviews.Title: Saying thank you
Reviews.Author: wesley w bagwell
Reviews.Content: Every thing was in the package  that was on the list every when it was spite up it wasnt  too far apart!

Reviews.Title: Some issues
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: When I first got this phone I really liked it but after a while I started to notice some of the problems with it.1. I will go to open my gallery and it will freeze the phone and I will have to restart the phone.2. While outside either texting or on a app. The phone will start acting weird and make it nearly impossible to text. This I notice only when it was sunny outside.3. The phone will just freeze up and some times restart itself.Here is a link to other problems and related issues.[...]

ProductInfo.Features:
Upgraded with Android 2.2 Froyo operating system, this Samsung smartphone allows you browse internet wirelessly
The doubleTwist option of the Samsung Sidekick 4G T-Mobile helps you to synchronize iTunes playlists, videos and images with your PC.
Organize your mails with the Outlook sync capability of this Samsung smartphone.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SGH T839 Sidekick 4g T-mobile Black Android Wifi GPS Cell Phone
